about_the_game:
Introduction:

Welcome to Undercroft, a mysterious world where secrets abound and every decision matters. Dive into the immersive storytelling of Tobor and embark on an epic adventure like no other.

Key Features:

1. Explore 16 Surveillance Feeds: Delve deep into the heart of Undercroft as Tobor, the spy robot, and uncover the truth hidden within its surveillance feeds.
2. Shape Multiple Endings: Your choices shape the fate of Undercroft and its inhabitants. Will you uncover the truth or succumb to the mysteries that lurk within?
3. Collect Clues: Gather text dialogues scattered throughout the game world to uncover the secrets of Undercroft and unlock new insights into its characters and lore.
4. Immersive Storytelling: Immerse yourself in a rich and atmospheric world filled with intrigue, suspense, and unexpected twists at every turn.

Why Tobor:

  • Engaging Gameplay: Tobor offers a unique blend of exploration, puzzle-solving, and narrative-driven gameplay that will keep you hooked from start to finish.
  • Dynamic Characters: Interact with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motivations, secrets, and hidden agendas waiting to be uncovered.
  • Stunning Visuals: Experience the haunting beauty of Undercroft through stunning visuals and atmospheric sound design that will draw you into its mysterious depths.

Experience Tobor Today:



Join Tobor and unravel the mysteries of Undercroft today. Your adventure awaits!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work:  General Mature Content, Cartoon Violence, Depictions fo suicide, execution, and anxiety, Bright flashing imagery

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: TOBOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4330 @ 3.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX570 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X or Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4670
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the mysterious world of Undercroft as Tobor, a spy robot uncovering secrets through 16 surveillance feeds. Your choices shape the story in this thrilling adventure with multiple endings.
